channel.title: Prayer

item.title: Prayer
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

}
public void prayerDrain() {
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Undefeatable”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Extermilator”)){
return;
}
if(ProtItem){
playerLevel[5] -= 1;
}
if(StrPrayer >= 1){
playerLevel[5] -= 1;
}
if(DefPray >= 1){
playerLevel[5] -= 1;
}
if(AtkPray >= 1){
playerLevel[5] -= 1;
}
if(RangePray >= 1){
playerLevel[5] -= 2;
}
if(MagePray >= 1){
playerLevel[5] -= 1;
}
if(ProtMage || ProtRange || ProtMelee || Retribution || Redemption || Smite){
playerLevel[5] -= 2;
}
if(Chivalry){
playerLevel[5] -= 1;
}
if(Piety){
playerLevel[5] -= 2;
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

How do you make it so your prayer actually drains at a reasonable time? When i use mage pray on my server, i go from 99 to 0 in like 10 seconds. here’s my code

if(ProtItem){
playerLevel[5] -= 1;
}
if(StrPrayer >= 1){
playerLevel[5] -= 1;
}
if(DefPray >= 1){
playerLevel[5] -= 1;
}
if(AtkPray >= 1){
playerLevel[5] -= 1;
}
if(RangePray >= 1){
playerLevel[5] -= 1;
}
if(MagePray >= 1){
playerLevel[5] -= 1;
}
if(ProtMage || ProtRange || ProtMelee || Retribution || Redemption || Smite){
playerLevel[5] -= 2;
}
if(Chivalry){
playerLevel[5] -= 1;
}
if(Piety){
playerLevel[5] -= 2;
}
